reviewText: Bautifully told true legend. Great music. Mouth movements slightly robotic.

Movie is awesome but DVD quality is very cheap. Dvd cover has price in indian currency of Rs. 299 which means that dvd disc quality made according to that price. It won't last for more than couple of times viewing so returning it back. Plus it is not playable on all dvd players. Great movie but they need to focus on quality of dvd if selling it for 17$.

Excellent !!!!!! It represents the True Universal Sikh Religion and it is based on True Saga of the Tenth Guru and his Children whom were given too many offer to live life and lured with get married with princess and kingdom to get convert but they gave the preference to die rather than conversion. It is full of Bravery. One Sikh is equal to 125 Thousand to fight in the battlefield Sikh is Saint as well as Soldier and always there when someone need their help. Sikh  prayers always end  with the well wishing of humanity
